scripts.postinstall:
mkdir -p app/assets/stylesheets app/assets/webfonts && cp -rf node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/webfonts/* app/assets/webfonts/ && (grep -q 'Font Awesome' app/assets/stylesheets/application.css || (echo '
/* vendor: fontawesome */' >> app/assets/stylesheets/application.css && cat node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.min.css >> app/assets/stylesheets/application.css))
